餘光.definition: (out of) the corner of one's eyes; peripheral vision; residual light; light of the setting sun

餘切.definition: cotangent (of angle), written cot θ or ctg θ

餘割.definition: cosecant (of angle), written cosec θ or csc θ

餘力.definition: energy left over (to do sth else)

餘勇可賈.definition: lit. spare valor for sale (idiom); fig. after former successes, still ready for more work; not resting on one's laurels

餘姚.definition: Yuyao, county-level city in Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1], Zhejiang

餘姚市.definition: Yuyao, county-level city in Ningbo 寧波|宁波[Ning2 bo1], Zhejiang

餘孽.definition: remaining evil element; surviving members (of an evil former regime); dregs (of a colonial administration)

餘干.definition: Yugan county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

餘干縣.definition: Yugan county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi

餘慶.definition: Yuqing county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

餘慶縣.definition: Yuqing county in Zunyi 遵義|遵义[Zun1 yi4], Guizhou

餘杭.definition: Yuhang district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

餘杭區.definition: Yuhang district of Hangzhou city 杭州市[Hang2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

餘溫.definition: residual heat; remaining warmth; (fig.) lingering enthusiasm

餘熱.definition: residual heat; surplus heat; waste heat; (fig.) capacity of retirees to continue to work

餘生.definition: the remaining years of one's life; survival (after a disaster)

餘留.definition: remainder; fractional part (after the decimal point); unfinished

餘碼.definition: excess code (i.e. the unused bits in binary-coded decimal)

餘緒.definition: vestigial residue; a throwback (to a former age)

餘角.definition: complementary angle (additional angle adding to 90 degrees)

餘輝.definition: variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]

餘集.definition: complement of a set S (math.); the set of all x not in set S

餘音繞梁.definition: reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)

餘韻.definition: pleasant lingering effect; memorable stylishness; haunting tune; aftertaste (of a good wine etc)

餘響繞梁.definition: reverberates around the rafters (idiom); fig. sonorous and resounding (esp. of singing voice)

餘額.definition: balance (of an account, bill etc); surplus; remainder
